meanings.definition: A type of Filipino dish made with grilled meat and served with a dipping sauce.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious saladang at the Filipino restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The saladang was a hit at the family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The saladang decided to take a dip in the sauce for a refreshing swim.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the saladang sizzling on the grill filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The saladang was so flavorful, it left a lasting impression on my taste buds.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Thai salad made with green papaya, tomatoes, and peanuts.
meanings.sent1: The Thai restaurant's saladang was a perfect blend of flavors.
meanings.sent2: I love the crunchiness of the green papaya in the saladang.
meanings.sent3: The saladang and the peanuts had a friendly chat in the bowl.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the saladang reminded me of a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent5: Every bite of the saladang was like a burst of freshness in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A type of Cambodian salad made with shredded green mango, peanuts, and herbs.
meanings.sent1: The Cambodian market offered a variety of saladang options.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed the unique combination of flavors in the saladang.
meanings.sent3: The saladang and the herbs danced together in the bowl.
meanings.sent4: The saladang was a refreshing oasis in the hot Cambodian weather.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the peanuts in the saladang added a delightful texture.
